body.name: CLOKOWE 4K Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, 180° Rotation & Auto Keystone, Full HD 1080P Supported, Portable HY300 Outdoor Movie Projector, Compatible with TV Stick/Windows/iOS/Android/HDMI/USB
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 13 mins
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 10 hrs 58 mins
features: 【𝗛𝗗 𝟭𝟬𝟴𝟬𝗣 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗼𝗹𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 & 𝟰𝗞 𝗩𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗼 𝗗𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴】Immerse yourself in stunning visuals as our projector supports high-definition 1920x1080P resolution. Full-format decoding including HEVC/VP9/AVS2/AVC 4K@30fps and AV1/MPEG1/MPEG2 1080p/60fps decoding and so on. Elevate your viewing with sharper details and embrace the future of projection technology.

【𝟭𝟴𝟬°𝗥𝗼𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗷𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻】 Turn any surface into a cinematic canvas! Our projector seamlessly rotates to project onto walls, ceilings, or even the floor. Enjoy an immersive viewing experience from any angle within your home.

【𝗦𝗲𝗮𝗺𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗗𝘂𝗮𝗹-𝗕𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗪𝗶𝗳𝗶𝟲】Stay seamlessly connected with the latest Wi-Fi 6 technology, it can compatible with 2.4G and 5G network. The wifi6 ensuring smooth streaming across IOS, Android, and Windows devices, experience faster and more stable transmission compared to traditional 2.4G and 5G WIFI.

【𝗕𝗹𝘂𝗲𝘁𝗼𝗼𝘁𝗵 𝟱.𝟮 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 & 𝗛𝗶-𝗙𝗶 𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗿】With a built-in 1*3W Hi Fi speaker, immerse yourself in excellent audio. Connect headphones, speakers, and other devices via Bluetooth to enjoy cinema-level surround sound at home.

【±𝟰𝟱°𝗔𝘂𝘁𝗼 𝗞𝗲𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗿𝗿𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 & 𝗠𝗮𝘅 𝟮𝟬𝟬" 𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘆】Forget manual adjustments! Our projector offers ±45° Auto Keystone Correction, guaranteeing a perfectly aligned image from any angle. Revel in every detail and vibrant color on a max 200” screen display, creating an unforgettable movie night or gaming session.

How to watch video from Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, Hulu, etc? Copyrighted videos such as Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and Hulu must be played through Fire Stick, Roku, Computer, or laptop. Can i connect this to a laptop to project projects? You can connect the projector to your laptop via HDMI. Will there be any noise from device while projecting ? It’s very quiet! The noise level below 25dB. Why can't my phone's Bluetooth be found on the projector? Because bluetooth only supports connecting sound devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product for the cost!
reviews.reviewText: **4.5 out of 5 stars - Incredible value for a mini projector**I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this mini projector. For the price, it's an incredible find! The picture quality is great. The colors are vibrant and the image is sharp. The projector is also very easy to set up and use.The only downside is that you can't have the projector in the vertical position with an HDMI cable. This can be a bit tedious, but there are other ways to connect the projector, so it's not a deal breaker.Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase. It's a great value for the price, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a mini projector.**Pros:*** Great picture quality* Easy to set up and use* Affordable price**Cons:*** Can't have the projector in the vertical position with an HDMI cable* Sound quality could be better**Overall rating:** 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not connect
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for Christmas for my son because we love watching movies. Would not connect as advertised. Spent hours troubleshooting and restarting and resetting both my surface and iPhone and still was unable to connect. Here we are a month later and I have given completely given up. Even tried connecting the projector by USB connectivity and still will not connect. It should not be this difficult to connect via Bluetooth , miracast, iOScast or USB. The device will not even pull up and both devices needed to connect are in the same room so there’s not any interference. I will be returning this piece of crap as soon as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised by the quality of this mini projector. It is light and portable, features an easily adjustable projection angle, and delivers a vibrant and sharp image.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use and price pretty good
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's very easy to use, easy to move, light, and the video quality isn't really bad. There is a bit of noise, but not enough to interfere with watching a movie. Plus the prices are really crazy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good projector
reviews.reviewText: Quality is very good portable easy to set up good projection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unexpected great value!
reviews.reviewText: This little projector is a great value. It is sharper and brighter that I had expected at this price point. Yes, you need to use it in a dimly lit room, but it works well. My favorite set-up is to use the projector on a large wall, while directing the audio to a sound bar. This method gives a small theatre-like experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nope….Tried twice and doesn’t work as advertised.
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely will not connect as the instructions state. IOS devices do not work over WiFi or with lightning cable as instructed. Returned the first one thinking it was broken, but second unit is exactly the same. Go with a better brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Needed some way to watch movies that was not a TV. Found this projector inexpensive and easy to use. Connects to my computer with an HDMI and my phone and tablet via Bluetooth. Occasionally the Bluetooth lags with the audio for 2-3 sec. But we don’t mind it. Sometimes we project onto our ceiling for a different experience but we can only do that with Bluetooth. Our HDMI cable gets in the way otherwise and we are not able to turn the projector perpendicular to the floor. Will try to use this projector for as long as we can. Have had it for 3 months now and still working great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well, clear picture and easy to set up. We had a lovely summer of movies because of this item and looking forward to annt more. Great deal for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Managed to get this whilst on offer at a very reasonable price. Was sceptical due to lack of reviews compared to others but I am pleasantly surprised. Easy to set up, picture quality is great (I’ve seen worse on TV’s) and the sound quality is perfect for my bedroom. Would definitely recommend.My only gripe is that is stated it has a silent cooling system, it’s not that quiet but after a while you forget about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to set up, great picture quality, decent sound and you can connect to a speaker if you like. I was hoping to connect to my phone but my Samsung phone is incomplatable, but we have hooked it up to a firestick instead. I can see its got a screw slot on the bottom for a tripod so will be shopping for one next.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: ‼️TOP NOTCH NOT TO BE MISSED BARGAIN‼️
reviews.reviewText: Easier than Lego to assemble and set up which was faster than the kettle boiling.Small and lightweight but packs a massive punch above its weight.I’ve tried various devices at a range of prices from £45 to £600 this one was rated in top 5-10 of leading projectors top 2 being Epsom at around £300, so coming in at number 3 I had to give it a go and it is excellent so grab one now before they go up.They are worth buying just to have about it’s so useful.Was that good I’ve scrapped the tvs. With Summer here I’ve got one for the car when we go camping or to the park it’s that versatile.Now the sound is good but if you want a more dramatic experience then a cheap sound bar will do.The fan is loud at first but the bar does muffle it out.Picture quality is better than some tvs and works just as well without the screen which you can also upgrade cheaply for around £20-£45 or if you want something more expensive they can go up to £1000s but you’ll find this one supplied is sufficient.There is a newer version for an extra £80 but it’s it only says 5g and blue tooth as extras but I seem to be getting them capabilities with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Little bit loud so taken off one star. Easy to set up with phone or laptop. Picture is clear and can be projected onto a large surface.
